name: HOME AGAIN (REBELHEAD Games)
description:
This is 'HOME AGAIN' a (very) short walking simulator story. What I wanted to achieve here is to tell a short sad story about a nameless boy who has a hard time in life...

By the use of some text, colors, and figures, I tried to bring a message to the players.

I hope you can appreciate my work I've put into this. I try to build upon my knowledge as I go along.

Yours truly,

D - REBELHEAD GAMES.
